Title: [ANN] [APA] All Public Art - Art and Blockchain together-ICO coming soon
Body: What is a smart contract and why is it beneficial for buying and selling art?

Author: AllPublicArt
Title: [ANN] [APA] All Public Art - Art and Blockchain together-ICO coming soon
Body: A smart contract is a blockchain-based program that due to its transparency, will bring trust and security to the art trading process. Smart contracts also reduce additional transaction costs normally associated with selling art.

Author: AllPublicArt
Title: [ANN] [APA] All Public Art - Art and Blockchain together-ICO coming soon
Body: Blockchain Gets Artsy: How the Technology Could Help Secure the Art Market Against Fraud  https://i.imgur.com/Q51NlDt.jpg  The art world might have a new advocate: blockchain technology. The scope of application and the effectiveness of blockchain technology across many industry types is being seriously considered, based on the type of advantages blockchain can deliver. This means the world of art may be able to utilize the technology, too.  Read full article here:  https://www.equities.com/news/blockchain-gets-artsy-how-the-technology-could-help-secure-the-art-market-against-fraud

Author: AllPublicArt
Title: [ANN] [APA] All Public Art - Art and Blockchain together-ICO coming soon
Body: The answer is yes because the system will only allow the unique IDs of the artist and collector to be traced, while their personal information remains anonymous. This aids in the security of the transaction and allows other potential collectors to view the history of the artwork therefore preventing plagiarism.

Author: AllPublicArt
Title: [ANN] [APA] All Public Art - Art and Blockchain together-ICO coming soon
Body: Hi BitFalcon5,  If an artist decides to trade their artworks on the platform, they will be required to provide identification so that we can ensure a safe and secure marketplace.  For artists and other users who are just posting on the platform without engaging in the actual trading in the marketplace, they will not be required to provide identification during registration (the regular registration process is similar to other popular social media sites such as Instagram or Facebook). So you don't need a passport and can use a pseudonym if you aren't planning on trading.

Author: AllPublicArt
Title: [ANN] [APA] All Public Art - Art and Blockchain together-ICO coming soon
Body: Can you believe we are already halfway through 2018? We know you have been making the most of the year and so has APA! Check out the new blog post here:  https://allpublicart.io/blog/all-public-art-roadshows-and-conferences

Author: grahamgoddard
Title: [ANN] [APA] All Public Art - Art and Blockchain together-ICO coming soon
Body: Art has been around in some form or the other for hundreds and thousands of years. By merging the art and digital world, we'll continue to ensure that art has a place in a future that's headed towards huge technological advancements. Our platform will allow artists from around the globe to stand on the same stage and connect with like minded individuals in a way that has never really been done before. This project is also about empowering artists and because I am also an artist I feel passionately about creating a system that has the artist and their enthusiasts in mind first.  This project is about impacting the lives of real people in the way that I would want my own life to be impacted.

Author: AllPublicArt
Title: [ANN] [APA] All Public Art - Art and Blockchain together-ICO coming soon
Body: Hi Juicejoyce, you are absolutely right we haven't been on top of this thread. We'll try to keep it updated better from now on, right now the private pre-sale and the roadshows have taken up most of our time.  Regarding the Token Sale it will launch when we are ready to launch, I know this might not be the kind of answer you are looking for, but we think it is in everyone's best interest if we have a smooth launch. We will announce the token sale on Bitcointalk as well.

Author: AllPublicArt
Title: [ANN] [APA] All Public Art - Art and Blockchain together-ICO coming soon
Body: Hi Nonlinearboy, I'm not sure what issue you are encountering? The link is working and is active, do you perhaps have an error message you are receiving so I can look into it? https://t.me/joinchat/G_xrCRB5DyRk58-dmGne6g  The devs have never left the project as a matter of fact they are still on the road attending pretty much all of the roadshows. They are just incredibly busy with the roadshows, but once those are over they will have more time to attend to questions on Telegram and Bitcointalk. P.s. when it comes to questions regarding the bounties, please keep those in the separate bounty thread and definitely do not post it on Telegram.

Author: AllPublicArt
Title: [ANN] [APA] All Public Art - Art and Blockchain together-ICO coming soon
Body: Please be aware that the tokens are not being sold as an investment to investors, but as a way for people to participate on our platform and use the tokens on it. That being said, when the tokens are sold, the cryptocurrency used to buy them are held in a multi-signature wallet where an escrow company and the companyâ€™s team only have access to the funds by consensus together. This minimises the potential abuse of the money that was received from the sales.

Author: AllPublicArt
Title: [ANN] [APA] All Public Art - Art and Blockchain together-ICO coming soon
Body: Hi Crypto Girl, The AllPublicArt Token was created to do much more than only allowing patrons to gift artists. Our community of artists will be able to use the APA tokens to get art supplies and art materials at discounted rates from affiliate art business on The All Public Art platform. Also, it has been our mission to ensure that the token is utilized as a tool that can contribute to minimizing market manipulation, counterfeit art and fraud through the power and transparency of the blockchain.  Our community of artists, art enthusiasts and art collectors will be able to use the AllPublicArt tokens in quite a few ways that are designed to empower the art community. Weâ€™re excited to contribute to some change!! Thanks for your question, we support ARTBYTE and any other company or organization that is focused on enhancing the art community! ðŸ™ðŸ½ðŸ‘ðŸ½

Body: I have joined in several signature bounty campaigns managed by @jamalaezaz, this manager is very nice and hard working, he can update the spreadsheet on time and what is more important, he seems very good at choosing potential ICO projects, so I choose to follow his bounty.
